components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description: Developers need to be able to specify the location of their android sdk if they don't have a ANDROID_SDK environment variable. "--android" is an error message thrown from the titanium scripts, so that's the argument we'll use for "run" as well.
fields.summary: Add --android for specifying the android sdk to alloy run

comments.body: For the time being, a modification has been made to the android builder.py output to inform developers they need to set their ANDROID_SDK environment variable if they want to use alloy run from the command line. I left a TODO in there that mentions that alloy run will eventually be made absolute through running it through titanium
